name: Gogomath - Prodigy Math Learning Games
description: Learn math in a fun and inspiring way from home! Work through 3,000+ exercises to develop mathematical skills and challenge your friends online!  In Gogomath, you will work through various math topics and levels, like addition / subtraction / multiplication / division / reading time / unit conversion, which gradually builds up a strong mathematics foundation and strengthen your logic thinking.   KEY FEATURES  The best math learning app for all ages and levels.  Based on a proven Japanese methodology.  3,000+ exercises for various mathematical topics.  Enjoy the company of a virtual pet friend and make progress together.  Challenge your friends and players around the world online  Safe and 100% ad-free.  Terms of Use: https://api.gogomath.com/terms.html Privacy Policy: https://api.gogomath.com/policy.html  CONNECT WITH US Contact support@gogomath.com for help or suggestions, and welcome to https://www.gogomath.com to explore more.
